ingredients.name: Olive oil (or any other oil you like)

title: Quick Mayonnaise
description: You can do this in a blender or food processor. Takes 5 minutes.
directions: Blend egg, salt, mustard, and 1/4 cup of the oil until mixed.
Slowly drizzle remaining oil as you slowly blend. It should thicken.
Drizzle in lemon juice while blending.
